avelino/awesome-go.shortDescription: Go is a programming language built to resemble a simplified version of the C programming language.

markets/awesome-ruby.shortDescription: Ruby is a scripting language designed for simplified object-oriented programming.

isRuslan/awesome-elm.shortDescription: Elm is a programming language for declaratively creating web browser-based graphical user interfaces.

rizo/awesome-ocaml.label: OCaml
rizo/awesome-ocaml.shortDescription: OCaml is an industrial strength programming language supporting functional, imperative and object-oriented styles.

ziadoz/awesome-php.label: PHP

veelenga/awesome-crystal.shortDescription: Crystal is a self-hosted, general purpose programming language.

qinwf/awesome-R.label: R
qinwf/awesome-R.shortDescription: R is a free programming language and software environment for statistical computing and graphics.

enaqx/awesome-react.label: React
enaqx/awesome-react.shortDescription: React is an open source JavaScript library used for designing user interfaces.

gdi2290/awesome-angular.shortDescription: Angular is an open source JavaScript-based framework for building web applications.

vuejs/awesome-vue.shortDescription: Vue.js is a JavaScript framework for building interactive web applications.

webpack-contrib/awesome-webpack.label: Webpack
webpack-contrib/awesome-webpack.shortDescription: Webpack is a bundler that takes modules with dependencies and creates static assets.

Famolus/awesome-sass.shortDescription: Sass is an extension of CSS, adding nested rules, variables, selector inheritance and more.

unicodeveloper/awesome-nextjs.shortDescription: Next.js is a framework for server-rendered or statically-exported React apps.

hyperapp/awesome.shortDescription: Hyperapp is a 1 KB JavaScript library for building frontend applications.

rosarior/awesome-django.label: Django
rosarior/awesome-django.shortDescription: Django is a web application framework for Python. It is meant to prioritize reusability and rapid development.

ekremkaraca/awesome-rails.label: Rails
ekremkaraca/awesome-rails.shortDescription: Ruby on Rails is a web application framework written in Ruby. It is meant to help simplify the building of complex websites.

hothero/awesome-rails-gem.shortDescription: A collection of Ruby Gems for Rails development. The goal is to help developers build awesome applications.

chiraggude/awesome-laravel.shortDescription: Laravel is a popular PHP framework, used for the development of MVC web applications.

JStumpp/awesome-android.shortDescription: Android is an operating system built by Google designed for mobile applications.

vsouza/awesome-ios.shortDescription: iOS is the operating system for Apple's mobile products.

jondot/awesome-react-native.shortDescription: React Native is a JavaScript mobile framework developed by Facebook.

sindresorhus/awesome-electron.label: Electron
sindresorhus/awesome-electron.shortDescription: Electron is a framework for building cross-platform desktop applications with web technology.

sindresorhus/awesome-nodejs.shortDescription: Node.js is a tool for executing JavaScript in a variety of environments.
